scripts.start: prisma deploy -p prisma.yml && prisma generate -p prisma.yml && NODE_ENV=production node index.js
scripts.dev: prisma deploy -p prisma.yml && prisma generate -p prisma.yml && NODE_ENV=development nodemon -e js,prisma,graphql index.js
scripts.test: prisma deploy -p prisma.test.yml && prisma generate -p prisma.test.yml && NODE_ENV=test jest --verbose --runInBand && prisma generate -p prisma.dev.yml
